Package io.vertigo.core.util

Class Selector

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.vertigo.core.util.Selector
  • public final class Selector
extends Object
    Selector of classes and methods. 1. Define a scope/set of classes - by addind them - by their packages 2. filter - classes - methods 3 - find your classes or methods.
    Author:
    mlaroche

      Conditions for selecting a class.

      Conditions for selecting a method.
      static class  Selector.MethodConditions
      Conditions for selecting a method.
